extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Opening Untrusted ASM Files
extracted_playbook.description: Do not open untrusted ASM files in affected applications to mitigate CVE-2024-54093.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to V224.0 Update 5 or Later
extracted_playbook.description: Update the affected application to V224.0 Update 5 or a later version to mitigate CVE-2024-54093.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Opening Untrusted PAR Files
extracted_playbook.description: Do not open untrusted PAR files in affected applications to mitigate CVE-2024-54094.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to V224.0 Update 10 or Later
extracted_playbook.description: Update the affected application to V224.0 Update 10 or a later version to mitigate CVE-2024-54095.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms as a general security measure.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure IT Environment According to Siemens Guidelines
extracted_playbook.description: Configure the IT environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for Industrial Security and follow the recommendations in the product manuals.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Control System Networks Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.
